desc: 攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを４０％アップ＆ＢＢゲージが多いほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ＆残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ

dictionary.lore: One of the powerful and mysterious crowns handed down from god to god. Though its origins remain a mystery, there is one account left regarding this crown. According to the story, this crown is named after the goddess who lived in the Tower of Trials and had given her divine protection to the flower-loving queen of a small country. When the young queen saw the goddess bearing this crown, it is said that the divinity which surrounded her immediately prompted her to pledge her life to the gods.

name: 綺神冠『レフ・ネヴァナ』
